Class Limb

    public class Limb
extends PortableItem
    A class which represents the limb that drops off from the Zombie
    Author:
    Tan Wei Li

    • Constructor Detail

      • Limb

        public Limb(java.lang.String name,
            char displayChar,
            java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
        Create a limb object by passing the specified name and displayChar argument into PortableItem constructor and add the specified capability for the limb
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this Item
        displayChar - the character to use to represent this item if it is on the ground
        capability - the Capability to add to the limb

    • Method Detail

      • getAllowableActions

        public java.util.List<edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action> getAllowableActions(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                                                            edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Return a list consisting of CraftWeaponAction only if the actor is Player and has the limb in his inventory. This is to make sure only Player can perform CraftWeaponAction on the limb and the limb must be picked up before it is able to be crafted.
        Parameters:
        actor - actor that we're interested in, i.e. owner of the list of possible actions
        map - game map the actor is currently on
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of Action
